flawed_nl_solution:
Santana has 1 + 1 + 2 = <<1+1+2=6>>6 brothers with birthdays in the second half of the year.
She has 7 brothers - 6 brothers = <<7-6=1>>1 brothers with birthdays in the first half of the year.
Altogether, she has to buy 6 + 7 = <<6+7=13>>13 presents in the second half of the year.
Therefore, she has to buy 13 - 1 = <<13-1=12>>12 more presents in the second half of the year.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 4, not 6. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
